scripts.deploy-mobile-release: export CLIQZ_BUILD_ENV=production && export CLIQZ_CONFIG_PATH=./configs/mobile.json && broccoli build build && python specific/mobile/deploy-mobile.py -b build/mobile/search -k mobile/extension
scripts.deploy-mobile-beta: export CLIQZ_BUILD_ENV=production && export CLIQZ_CONFIG_PATH=./configs/mobile.json && broccoli build build && python specific/mobile/deploy-mobile.py -b build/mobile/search -k mobile/beta
